title: RIP H8Daddy
body:
You were a strong Nasus laner that got over 2,000 stacks every game. But unfortunately the mods picked five ADCs and balanced you to death.

Realtalk though: He made a thread and deleted it right away because he knew it was wrong. As it turns out though mods don't care and decided to perma him anyways. HD told us that he was posting less and less here anyways, so he isn't interested in getting a forum smurf to post again.

Rest in peace, SweetDady.

http://i.imgur.com/c6w0QkB.jpg
